alert.note: Alert for Color Country Mountains; Color Country West Desert (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 09 at 3:22PM MDT until June 12 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 495 AND 496... The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Sunday morning through Sunday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 495 Color Country West Desert and Fire Weather Zone 496 Color Country Mountains. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts in excess of 40 mph Sunday afternoon and evening, and again Monday afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Afternoon relative humidity falling into the 9 to 12 percent range. Overnight recovery to around 40 percent is expected Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions are possible. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that there is a potential for critical fire weather conditions. Continue to monitor for the latest forecasts and for possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Color Country Mountains; Color Country West Desert
